MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L30  postcode area of Bootle, affecting properties in Poulsom Drive and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.39AM. Our engineers are on their way to the local area to investigate the cause of the power loss and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 2.45PM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.18PM on 25th October 2020.
